projectGroups.name: SocialCops
projectGroups.description: SocialCops have managed to secure massive clients due to their focus on what they call ‘Data Intelligence’ - using data effectively to glean valuable and actionable insights on a large scale. They are working on a web platform which covers the entire data pipeline, from collection to visualization. I was largely tasked with producing realistic product mockups for said platform for the corporate website, but also had a chance to work on their live ‘Visualize’ product

projects.name: National Data Dashboard
projects.overview: A dashboard for tracking a range of indicators on a national level, with granularity down to a district level.
projects.imgAltText: Map with colored areas on a web app dashboard

projects.name: Product Mockups (incl. GIFS)
projects.overview: Making a tonne of simplified product mock-ups, mostly depicting future features (i.e. without references).
projects.imgAltText: A variety of web application mockups / screenshots

projects.name: SCSS-based color palette generator
projects.overview: A bit of funky SCSS for automatically generating color palettes from a single color input.
projects.imgAltText: A range of monochromatic color palettes

projects.name: My Application to SocialCops
projects.overview: The mini-tasks that got me a job at SocialCops. Infographics, microsites and a little UI for good measure.
projects.imgAltText: An infographic showing various data relating to Malaria

projectGroups.name: trivago
projectGroups.description: trivago is one of the big players in the online travel market. They provide users with a simple to use and comprehensive hotel search engine. They gave me my first job as a designer, which provided me with a fantastic opportunity to learn the ropes.

projects.name: Hotel Ratings & Reviews Slideout
projects.overview: Make the hotel reviews / ratings / info more accessible on trivago (i.e. reduce users' need to visit partner site for anything other than booking)
projects.imgAltText: A sample of an interface relating to hotel ratings on trivago

projects.name: Hotel Item Element
projects.overview: Clean up the hotel item element which populates the main results list on trivago.
projects.imgAltText: A collage depicting the evolution of a small user interface element

projects.name: Web Banner Design & Creation
projects.overview: Use web banners to drive traffic to trivago and improve brand recall. Must meet specific file-size and dimension criteria
projects.imgAltText: Web banners ads promoting various holiday destinations
